relevant_findings.heent: Supple neck, dry mucous membranes, NG tube in place draining green/brown liquid
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Normal effort, clear to auscultation bilaterally
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs, rubs, or gallops
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, very tender in RUQ but not in left side, no rigidity, rebound, or guarding, bowel sounds present
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert and oriented times three, no focal sensory or motor deficits
